description: Yamanobe Sayara is the head of the Aoyama Pharmaceutical research lab in Sayama. Originally researching bacteria, she discovered one that could be the key to cloning, she moved on to conduct illegal cloning experiments aiming to achieve immortality. She has a sadistic personality, often torturing her captives to death. In episode one, Sayara is last seen being surrounded by the delirious zombies she created. In episode three, she is revealed to have been saved by Apos in the last moment, who injects her with a time spore after her body is already considerably mutilated. As a result, she remains forever crippled and waits twenty-one years until a powered exoskeleton capable of supporting her is invented. After one last confrontation with http://anidb.net/ch16960 [Rin] and http://anidb.net/ch16963 [Maeno], she is finally killed by Apos, who removes and consumes her spore.
name: Yamanobe Sayara
